extends Input<Pointer.Listener>

    • Method Detail

      • register

        public Input.Registration register(Input.Region region,
                          Pointer.Listener listener)
        Configures a reaction to be notified of pointer activity. On pointer start, reactions will be scanned from most-recently-registered to least-recently-registered and hit-tested. Thus more recently registered reactions that overlap previously registered reactions will take precedence. TODO: use layer depth information to hit test based on depth.

        Subsequent pointer drag and end events will be dispatched to the reaction that successfully hit-tested the pointer start.

        Specified by:
        register in class Input<Pointer.Listener>
        Returns:
        a handle that can be used to clear this registration.
